ValidationRule.description: Ensure Total Opportunity Value is populated before progressing opportunity from "Identify" to "Qualify" stage and beyond. Total Opportunity Value should always be >= 300 if there are no products added for an opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( StageName ), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Qualify"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Propose"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ), OR(ISBLANK( Amount ), AND(Count_of_Opportunity_Line_Items__c = 0, Amount < 300)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Add the Total Opportunity Value. Your initial sales estimate must be assigned in the Total Opportunity Value field prior to adding products.
